title: Can i be banned for this?

replies.body: NinjaGuy69's response is pretty spot on.  If you're using macros to perform something for you that would otherwise not be possible, then you're creating an unfair advantage.   Be extra cautious about this, and check out our [third party](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/5kx4F7VE-reminder-third-party-applications) guide.  I'd say stick to the awesome chroma themes, and leave the automatic plays outside of League!

Any script or macro that gives a player an unfair advantage over other players is forbidden by Riot and can easily get you banned for cheating. The guy even says in the video that he designed the macro to give you a slight advantage over other players. Does that seem fair to you?
